mema hadisi nithi regulasi shri lankawe aandukrama wyawasthawa mangin saha jathyanthara nithiya mangin laba di athi mulika ayithiwasikam walata patahani bawata apa sanwidhana samuhaye samajika nidahas madhya wyaparaya athulu jathika saha jathyanthara manawa himikam kandayam ema regulasi panawana lada 2006 desambaraye sita nokadawa tharka kalaha. 2006 desambarayedi mema regulasi kriyathmaka kirima aarambha karana lada awasthawedi owun penwa dunne ema regulasi ketumpath kirimata yodagena athi pulul, apahadili ha nishchitha aruth nohangawana bhasha wilasaya hethuwen siwil samajayeth madhyawalath prajathanthrawadi nithyanukula kriyawan rashiyak aparadhamaya kriyawan se handinwimata ida labenu athi bawaya.

awangad siduwima sambandhayen adahas dakwu senewirathna deyak janathawata pawasa sitimata pa්rathamayen eeta adala nithimaya karunu wimasa sitiya yuthuwa athayi pawasuweya.ranawaka ohuta haras kapuweya.awangad siduwima adhyanaya kale nithipathi departhamenthuwe usas niladharayaku bawath ayatha ganudenu wala yedi athayi awangad samagama ha sambandha pudgalayin athadanguwata ganune ohuge nirdesha yatathe bawath ranawaka pawasuweya.namuth pasuwa thawath niladharayek wenath mathayak idiripath kala bawath anathuruwa katayuthu siduwuye ee anuwa bawath ranawaka kiweya.hitapu amathya thilak marapana mahathada mema katayuthu ha sambandhawa siti bawa hethema wadidutath sandahan kaleya.
natya nirmanaya kalata eeke therumak na.
